name: PARAMPARA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: We  develop activity plans in discussion with local people and other collaborators, identifying who would have to do what to achieve specific goals. Analysing a situation is part of the development process itself, helping people consider the factors that govern their lives and imagine how things could be done differently. MISSION OF  PARAMPARA FOUNDATION IS TO EMPOWER PEOPLE AND COMMUNITIES IN SITUATIONS OF POVERTY, ILLITERACY, DISEASE AND SOCIAL INJUSITICE. OUR INTERVENTIONS AIM TO ACHIEVE LARGE-SCALE, POSITIVE CHANGES THROUGH POTENTIAL. MOREOVER WE PROVIDE THEM WITH ECONOMICAL ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL PROGRAMS THAT ENABLE EVERYONE TOREALIZE THEIR STABILITY.WE HAVE SKILLED HUNDREDS OF WOMEN AND YOUTH AND PROCESS IS GOING ON.
